articles.author: Laura Paddison
articles.title: Heat waves in US and Europe would have been ‘virtually impossible’ without climate change, new report finds - CNN
articles.description: Extreme heat waves across three continents this month were made significantly more likely by the human-caused climate crisis, according to a new analysis released Tuesday as temperatures are still blazing in parts of the Northern Hemisphere.

articles.title: Webb detects water vapour in rocky planet-forming zone - European Space Agency
articles.description: New measurements by the NASA/ESA/CSA James Webb Space Telescope’s Mid-InfraRed Instrument (MIRI) has detected water vapour in the inner disc of the system PDS 70, located 370 light-years away. This is the first detection of water in the terrestrial region of …
